subject: Skiing
Sporting Goods and Equipment
World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: The best skiers have a technician to tune their equipment, and Ilka Stuhec’s ski tech is also her mother, Darja Crnko, the only woman to hold the job at the elite level.
snippet: The best skiers have a technician to tune their equipment, and Ilka Stuhec’s ski tech is also her mother, Darja Crnko, the only woman to hold the job at the elite level.
